name: Magegement
description:
Controls
  • Mouse click: movement / Management spell
  • R: restart level
Hints
  • There are at least 3 levels in training dungeon. To advance to next level, walk to the exit marked with an arrow.
  • Management spell costs 2 mana points.
  • At each level start, your HP and mana points are restored.
  • Some enemies will grant you varying amouns of mana on their death.
  • All enemies are susceptible to traps, just as you are, but some enemies cannot fall through the holes in the ground.
  • Some enemies have limited field of view and will stop chasing you if you're too far.
